Hi everyone, this is Steven Tu. I am an experienced English-Chinese translator and purchasing agent in Hangzhou, Zhejiang province. I have many years of working experience as an English-Chinese interpreter and sales representative in foreign trade companies. Now I work as a freelance interpreter and purchasing/buying agent. So far, I've helped and have been helping my foreign clients in purchasing cameras, bicycles, bar code readers, lipstick cases, derma roller, plastic cosmetic airless bottles and jars, curtain rods, portable freezer, sofa slipcover, brake shoes, brake drums, oil seals, brake chambers, aluminum sliding door parts, wooden bicycles,foam board, stainless steel fiber, cartons, textiles/fabrics, etc. I've been, accompanying my foreign clients or on behalf my client, to Hangzhou, Shaoxing, Ningbo, Yiwu, Jinhua, Huzhou, Keqiao, Shengzhou, Yongkang, Xiaoshan, Shangyu, Taizhou, Tonglu, etc. References/testimonials can be provided upon request.

I offer the following services:

1.Itinerary arrangement including hotel booking

  1. Factory visiting, on-site interpretation/translation, business meeting translation

3.Trade fair interpretation/translation

  1. Sourcing/purchasing/buying agent including looking for suppliers, inspecting shipments before they are shipped

  2. Business travel on your behalf

  3. International partnership matchmaking

  4. Help rent an apartment/flat/office in Hangzhou

  5. Set up a legal representative office in Hangzhou

Please contact me if you need my service.
